name: TC_55!330 (Lang: ar) | Bid:55!330-ar.ae.NoAuth
description:
Check: “Support” chat window is not opened after click on the “Support” button
         and this button disappears after the second clicking on it on any page
         after changing the language of the site (e.g. from EN to AR) (SCA license).
         Language: AR, EN.
         License: SCA.
         Author: Sergey Aiidzhanov
descriptionHtml:
Check: “Support” chat window is not opened after click on the “Support” button
     and this button disappears after the second clicking on it on any page
     after changing the language of the site (e.g. from EN to AR) (SCA license).
     Language: AR, EN.
     License: SCA.
     Author: Sergey Aiidzhanov

testStage.description:
Check: “Support” chat window is not opened after click on the “Support” button
         and this button disappears after the second clicking on it on any page
         after changing the language of the site (e.g. from EN to AR) (SCA license).
         Language: AR, EN.
         License: SCA.
         Author: Sergey Aiidzhanov

steps.name: Start retest manual TC_55!330 | “Support” chat window is not opened after click on the “Support” button and this button disappears after the second clicking on it on any page after changing the language of the site (e.g. from EN to AR) (SCA license).
Build dynamic argument for TCs of US_55

parameters.value: '“Support” chat window is not opened after click on the “Support” button and this button disappears after the second clicking on it on any page after changing the language of the site (e.g. from EN to AR) (SCA license).'

steps.name: Start Logout from account info menu in top bar
